It follows therefore that,
if perfect contact between 
the mercury and any com-
plete circle of the Barometer
tube can be produced the 
air will be effectually pre-
vented from ascending into 
the <u>vacuum<\u>
To enable the Society 
better to judge of the state 
of a question which I cannot 
but believe they will 
consider of some importance
